title: Amy’s Bad Driving Sparks Road Rage + Keith Urban Didn’t Know Major Country Artist Wrote His New Song
itunes:title: Amy’s Bad Driving Sparks Road Rage + Keith Urban Didn’t Know Major Country Artist Wrote His New Song
description:
Amy shares why a car in front of her on the interstate got extremely upset with her driving. Keith Urban calls in to talk to Bobby about his new single, which he didn’t know was co-written by a major country artist. He also shares the story about having to Uber to a recent show. Also, Bobby announces that Bobby Bones And The Raging Idiots are headed on tour.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
